content.rendered:
25 February 2015 Publication of fourth quarter 2014 results
28 April 2015 Publication of first quarter 2015 results
22 May 2015 Annual general meeting in Oslo, Norway
26 August 2015 Publication of second quarter 2015 results
27 October 2015 Publication of third quarter 2015 results

Aqualis reserves the right to revise the dates.

ENDS

For further information, please contact:

Christian Opsahl
CFO
Tel: +47 901 101 53
Email: christian.opsahl@aqualisbraemar.com
